quotes: Marian Horner Scowcroft, a diabetic, died on July 17, 1995, at George Washington University Hospital.
In March 1993, when Scowcroft was given an honorary KBE by Queen Elizabeth II, his daughter was also received by the Queen.
On August 6, 2020, Scowcroft died at his home in Falls Church, Virginia, at age 95.
On January 29, 2021, Scowcroft is buried at Arlington National Cemetery.

organizations.name: St. Francis School of Nursing
quotes: His wife, a Pennsylvania native, was trained as a nurse at St. Francis School of Nursing in Pittsburgh and graduated from Columbia University.
